featured.text: I. Irene Fostering empathy…By seeing an animal up close, the public could be encouraged to be more sensitive and compassionate to a species that is facing extinction in the wild.

definition.zh_def: 物種；生物分類的基本單位，指具有相似特徵並能夠交配繁殖的生物群體。
definition.en_def: A group of living organisms consisting of similar individuals capable of exchanging genes or interbreeding.
definition.example: There are over 8.7 million species of plants and animals on Earth.
